# [Interview #1120: Brandon Sanderson RAFOlympics at JordanCon 8, Entry #46](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1120#46)

#### Question

This is a yes-no-RAFO question. Did Shinovar originate on Roshar?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yeah. Mhm.
